name: What if Yume Nikki - had the unused effects
name_original: What if Yume Nikki - had the unused effects
description:
This is not a game, it is mostly an effects and engine test.

It was created in RPG Maker VX Ace created on January 25, 2020 by Annie-Mienai for an Amino contest of the same name "Yume Nikki What if".

The proposal presents a possibility of using the effects that were not included in the original Yume Nikki game.

Effects: 3 

Blindfold

Greyscale

Will-o'-the-Wisp

(some sprites and tiles are not from the original game and were created by me)

The game will no longer have support, updates or bug fixes. 

The available language of the game is only Spanish.

This test was made thanks to the unreleased Fangme called "Mado Wake Up" directed by the user "Romto Nikki" (Amino) and programmed by Annie-Mienai (see the download of "Mado Wake Up Proyect" if you want to get the game and its editable file) 

Credits to Kikiyama and Kadokawa games. (full credit list in-game)

_________________________________________

Controls: ButtonActionArrowsMoveZInteractXOpen MenuN° 1Execute Effect / SitN° 5Convert Effect into EggN° 9Wake up
